Unstable angina grade CCS Class IV severity ongoing symptom and/or ongoing infusion intravenous nitroglycerin ( See Appendix F ) 2 . Seconddegree great heart block 3 . Hypotension ( SPB < 90 mmHg ) 6 . Severe aortic stenosis ( > 100 mmHg peak transvalvar gradient < 0.6 cm2 estimate valve area ) 7 . Pulmonary edema within 7 day prior Study Day 1 8 .
